name: Pachinko Hall: Shinsou Daikaiten
overview: Pachinko Hall - Shinso Dai Kaiten is a strategy game that puts the player on charge of a pachinko store, at the beginning of the game the player can choose between 4 different assistants, and after that he got twenty years to manage the shop, buy new things, hire employees, etc. The goal is to win as much money as he can.
